mapper.select: select a.id,a.year,a.organ_info_id,a.unit_member_number,a.individual_member_number,a.start_date,a.term_time,a.director_number,a.standing_director_number,a.supervisor_number,a.secretariat_number,a.branches_number,a.representative_number,a.mechanisms_number,a.preparer,a.create_time,a.update_time ,b.company_name from organ_member_staff a left join organ_info b on a.organ_info_id = b.id where a.id = #{value} and a.is_delete=0
mapper.delete: update organ_member_staff set is_delete = 1 where id = #{value}

update organ_member_staff set is_delete = 1 where id in
#{id}
